entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %

Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
